faq.question: What is UISimplified?
faq.answer: UISimplified is a platform offering pre-built, customizable UI components to help developers build stunning user interfaces quickly and efficiently.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Simply sign up for an account, choose a pricing plan, and start integrating our components into your project.

faq.question: Can I customize the components?
faq.answer: Yes, all our components are highly customizable to fit your specific design requirements.

faq.question: Do you offer support?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer priority support for Pro and Enterprise users. Free users can access our documentation and community forums.

faq.question: What if I need a custom component?
faq.answer: Enterprise users can request custom components. Contact our sales team for more details.

features.title: Comprehensive Documentation

features.title: Fast Integration

features.title: Regular Updates

features.title: Unit Tests
